title: Elon Musk and Jeff Bezos are racing to enclose Earth in an orbital computer factory | Blaze Media

content: In Memphis, Tennessee, where Elon Musks xAI initiative spun up a compute factory of some 32,000 GPUs, the local grid could not sustain the demand. The solution was characteristic of the era: 14 mobil… [+5950 chars]
